title: Trudeau says Canadian military ready to support provinces in fighting coronavirus - The Globe and Mail
description: He said provinces have not asked for the military to intervene, but if that were to change, the Canadian Armed Forces are ‘ready to answer the call’
content:
Prime Minister Justin Trudeau addresses Canadians on the COVID-19 pandemic from Rideau Cottage in Ottawa on March 30, 2020. 
Sean Kilpatrick/The Canadian Press
Ottawa says 24,000 members of the Canadian Armed Forces stand ready to support provinces in the e… [+3477 chars]
